mapper.sql: SELECT fe.id, fe.mid, fe.bill_no, fe.entry_no, fe.src_bill_type, fe.src_bill_id, fe.src_entry_id, fe.src_no, fe.check_side, fe.amt, fe.remark, fe.custom1, fe.custom2, fe.version, CASE WHEN fe.amt - fp.checked_amt < 0 THEN 0 ELSE fe.amt - fp.checked_amt END AS unchecked_amt FROM fin_payable_check_entry fe, fin_payable fp
